namin pothak lesa mudranaya karannata ma ee dinawalama kala salasuma thawamath kal yamin pawathina bawath, eya ee salasuma elesama eda krriyathmaka kala nam, ada apa nithara asana me "bluk" yana wachanaya ee dinawala bhawithaye nothibunu muth, bihiwimata niyamithawa thibunu mudritha kruthiya, mage mulma blukaya pamanak nowa, mage mul ma mudritha granthaya da wennata ida thibunu bawa ma pera lipiyaka sandahan kalemi.

ehi nayakathwaya anura shiwantha kridakaya wisin daranu labuwa.  awasan maha tharangayedi owun athin katunayaka kristal matin kandayama parajayata pathwuna.  tharangawaliye dakshathama kridakaya lesa kalindu mihiruk sammanaya labuwa.  2017 pasal kanishta “jontabat” malala krida ulela me masa agadi nawala pitiye pawathwimata katayuthu yoda thibuna.  kesewethath ayahapath kalagunika thathwaya nisa ema krida ulela nowambar 8, 9,10 yana dinawala diyagamadi pawathwimata katayuthu yoda thibenawa.  wayasa 12n pahala, 13n pahala, 14 n pahala, 15n pahala yana wayas khanda yatathe balaka - balikawan 4500k mehidi tharanga wadimata niyamithaya.  “jontabat” kanishta malala krida ulela, pasal malala krida sangamaya wisin sanwidhanaya karanawa. 2017 wayasa 13n pahala singar kusalana krikat tharangawaliye tharanga kihipayak pasugiya da nimawa dutuwa.
